As soon as it opens, it crashes. Don't waste your money.

This app does not work on iOS 9.  They have not put out an update since 2013 and from the forums seem to have no sense of urgency to fix the problem.  If you have bought it go to the iTunes Store and get a refund.
I purchased it and it won't even work.  The game starts the loading screen and then disappears.  You can see it running in the background but can't bring it forth.  Waste of money.

Just purchased but cannot play it; running the app only crashes and immediately sends you back to the home screen. Reading other reviews shows that this game is incompatible with iOS 9. Wait to purchase until an update (which hasn't happened in a while) is done.

content.label: Do not purchase until they get the crash on launch issue fixed!

title.label: Don't waste money if you are using iOS 9

content.label: This app will not run on iOS 9.  The developer is aware of this and acknowledged on their website that there is an issue over a month ago, but still no update.  The game crashes within seconds of starting the app.  They are happy to take your money, though, and good luck getting a refund ...
I used to play this game it was great but it instantly crashes every time I open it and I just want that fixed please and thank you

title.label: Does not function in newest iOS

content.label: I've purchased this game and it does not open.  Apparently this is a known issue, and has been for several weeks.  However, there is no scheduled fix and if you shell out money to buy it, it will not work and your money will not be refunded.  Consider yourself warned.
Devs seriously need to update this game for it can be enjoyed for all who've purchased this game including people who are using iOS 9!!!!
The game crashes seconds after opening the application it's very frustrating I used to play this all of the time and make in app purchases please fix so I can get my money's worth!

Im really upset because i have this game on my computer and my ps4 but when i downloaded it on here it crashes on startup screen which is sad cause i really enjoy this game but the last update was for IOS5 so i guess i shouldve read the updates before spending 5 dollars...

Just bought this app and can't play it at all. I heard great things and would love to play it... I hate to lose $5 but my hope is that there will be an update. Until then DO NOT BUY THIS APP IF YOU HAVE IOS 9!!!
